title: Punished
description: Marlee has a secret she dare not divulge, and it isn't something that will withstand the scrutiny of a criminal investigation. When the computer system at the law firm where she works is hacked and critical information filched, she discovers she could be looking at jail time and begs them for the chance to repay them in whatever manner they see fit. The sentence is six months hard time-with six young lawyers. Contains explicit sex, graphic language, and some scenes of sex with mulitple partners.
author: Kimberly Zant
